markdown.markdown:
```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
readxl::read_xlsx("data/word_profiles.xlsx") |> 
  filter(!is.na(lemma)) |> 
  mutate(lemma = str_extract(lemma_for_site, "^.*?(?=( -))"),
         lemma = ifelse(is.na(lemma), lemma_for_site, lemma),
         lemma = str_remove_all(lemma, "\\(.*?\\)")) ->
  df
```

::: {.panel-tabset}


```{r}
#| results: asis
#| layout-ncol: 4

df |> 
  filter(wl_type == "NOUN") |> 
  distinct(lemma, lemma_for_site) |> 
  arrange(lemma) |> 
  filter(!is.na(lemma)) ->
  nouns

if(nrow(nouns) %% 4 != 0){
  nouns |> 
    bind_rows(tibble(lemma = rep("", nrow(nouns) %% 4), 
                     lemma_for_site = rep("", nrow(nouns) %% 4))) ->
    nouns
}

map(1:4-1, function(i){
  seq(1, nrow(nouns), by = 4) + i
}) |> 
  unlist() ->
  index

nouns |> 
  mutate(id = index) |> 
  arrange(id) ->
  nouns

walk2(nouns$lemma, 
      nouns$lemma_for_site,
      function(lemma, lemma_for_site) {
        htmltools::a(lemma_for_site, href = str_c(lemma, ".html")) |>
          htmltools::div(class = "col") |>
          print()
  }
)
```

library(tidyverse)

  nouns

  nouns |>

walk2(nouns$lemma,

)
